CustomField.description: This field contains the cross reference ID of an external or foreign record. In the case of ANZ Retail Retention integration, if the field "External System ID" contains a GUID of MYOB, this field will then contain the ID of the cross-referenced record in CorePlus. In this case, MYOB is the parent record and can cross-reference one or more CorePlus record - and vice-versa.
CustomField.label: External Record X REF ID
